page.title: 15MATHON GARDEN CENTRE.
page.content: At Mathon Garden Centre they sell { {trees,shrubs}and{conifers}. Mr Richards made his garden centre at Mathon because he lives quite near He sells his plants solely to nurseries and other garden centres all over the country.Planning the dispatch of the plants is done well in advance. He gets gravel from the Mathon pits to stand his pots in for good draining.The soil he uses comes mainly from the U.K.but some he imports from as far afield as Holland and Japan. It is a {wholesale}garden centre.
